price: Rãnar da Muke cẽwa ga Jahannama "Shin, kin cika?" Kuma ta ce: "Ashe,* akwai wani ƙãri?"
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ مِن مَّزِيدٖ
footnotes: * Wannan jawãbi na Jahannama yanã ɗaukar ma'anõni biyu. Ta farko tanã nũna ta cika ƙwarai, amma tanã kũkan a ƙara mata wani abu a cikinta. Wannan fassara ta yi daidai da ayãr da ta ce, "Lalle na cika Jahannama daga aljannu da mutãne gabã ɗaya." Sura ta 32, ãyã ta 13. Fassara ta biyu, ita ce Jahannama nã neman ƙãri tanã hushi sabõda mãsu sãɓawa umurnin Allah. Sũra ta 67 ãyõyi 6, 7 da 8.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma naqūlu lijahannama hali im'talati wataqūlu hal min mazīdin
